description: A request by an organization (buyer) to  another ogranization (seller) to order a new ethernet service or service component(s).
title: order

___projectId.description: An identifier that is used to group Orders that represent a unit of functionality that is important to a Buyer. A Project can be used to relate multiple Orders together.

$eref.description: Specifies relationships between the current document and an external resource.
$eref.title: link

___href.description: A URL. Specifies the location of the linked document.

___type.description: Specifies the media type of the linked document.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, link.

___title.description: Provide additional / advisory information (expand on the meaning of the link).

___method.description: Specifies how to send the data (e.g. get, post).

___rel.description: Specifies the relationship between the current document and the linked document.

___link.description: A self referencing link to the order.

___restorationPriority.description: Within the United States, indicates the provisioning and restoration priority as defined under the TSP Service Vendor Handbook

___completionDate.description: Identifies the date the Seller completed the Order. Formatted as YYYY-MM-DD (eg 1997-07-16) or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD (eg 1997-07-16T19:20+01:00).

___name.description: Identifies the name of the person or office.

___telephoneNumber.description: Identifies the telephone number (excluding extension) of the Contact.

___email.description: Identifies the electronic mail address of the Contact.

___telephoneNumberExt.description: Identifies the telephone number extension of the Contact.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, contact.

___buyerImplementationContact.description: The contact information for the implementation of this order.

___pricingTerm.description: The length of the service contract in months. Example: 12, 60, 120.

$eref.description: A reference to a resource, including it's ID, type, and a link to retrieve the resource.
$eref.title: resourceReference

___link.description: A link for accessing the resource.

___type.description: Specifies the type for the referenced resource.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, resourceReference.

___serviceabilityResponse.description: Value that associates this order with a previously assigned serviceability response.

___orderDate.description: Date when the order was created.

___sellerId.description: services to a buyer. Specifically, the ID of the Partner/Access Provider (Seller) organization receiving the order.

___promotionId.description: A set of characters identifying a promotion. Company specific.

___requestedCompletionDate.description: Identifies the buyer's desired due date (requested delivery date) formatted as  YYYY-MM-DD (eg 1997-07-16) or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD (eg 1997-07-16T19:20+01:00).

___buyerId.description: A Party Role played by an Individual or an Organization that buys products and services from a Seller. Specifically, the ID of the Service Provider (Buyer) organization placing the order.

___name.description: Identifies the name of the person or office.

___telephoneNumber.description: Identifies the telephone number (excluding extension) of the Contact.

___email.description: Identifies the electronic mail address of the Contact.

___telephoneNumberExt.description: Identifies the telephone number extension of the Contact.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, contact.

___buyerTechnicalContact.description: The technical contact information for this order.

___orderItems.description: An array of order items for this order.

$eref.description: An item on an order. The details of the order item are specified in the productSpecOrderDetails.
$eref.title: orderItem

___action.description: The action to be taken for this order item (E.g. Install, Change).

___orderItemDetail.description: The ordering representation of the product specification being ordered with this order item.

___orderItemReference.description: A reference number that can be used to refer to this order item.

___quantity.description: The quantity for the order item.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, orderItem.

___requestedStartDate.description: If specified, identifies the buyer's desired  date for order processing to start.  Formatted as  YYYY-MM-DD (eg 1997-07-16) or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD (eg 1997-07-16T19:20+01:00).

___objectType.description: The type of the object, order.

___name.description: Identifies the name of the person or office.

___telephoneNumber.description: Identifies the telephone number (excluding extension) of the Contact.

___email.description: Identifies the electronic mail address of the Contact.

___telephoneNumberExt.description: Identifies the telephone number extension of the Contact.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, contact.

___buyerOrderContact.description: The contact information for the buyer of this order.

___correctionOrderDueDate.description: Date by which the corrected/amended order must be sent to the Seller to ensure that the order is not CANCELLED. Formatted as YYYY-MM-DD (eg 1997-07-16) or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD (eg 1997-07-16T19:20+01:00).

___expectedCompletionDate.description: Identifies the date the Seller expects to complete the Order. Formatted as YYYY-MM-DD (eg 1997-07-16) or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD (eg 1997-07-16T19:20+01:00).

___correctionOrderExpected.description: If true, the Buyer is expected to send a corrective (supplemental) order as a replacement order.

___desiredResponses.description: The type of order responses that the buyer wishes to receive from the seller.

___buyerOrderVersion.description: The version number that the Buyer uses to refer to this particular version of the order.

___orderActivity.description: The type of order, as defined by the business (e.g.,install, change, disconnect).

___priority.description: Indicates that expedited treatment is requested and any charges generated in provisioning this request (e.g., additional engineering charges or labor charges if applicable) will be accepted; optional, can be used to indicate the assigned priority of this order relative to other orders in the Order Management system.

___pricingReference.description: The value associated with the Pricing Method selected (e.g. a contract or tariff id).

___pricingMethod.description: The pricing authority to be used to price the products on this order. Choice of Tariff, Contract, Individual Case Basis (ICB), Other.

___notes.description: Free form text used to clarify or explain the Order.

___orderType.description: Identifies the type of MEF service or service component that is being ordered.

___buyerPurchaseOrderNumber.description: A number that uniquely identifies a order within the buyer's enterprise.

___id.description: Unique identifier for the order that is generated by the Seller when the order is initially accepted via an API.

$eref.description: A billing information to set up a new billing account.
$eref.title: billingInformation

___billingAddress.description: Identifies a property address or postal delivery address. Used to establish a new billing account. Must be specified if existingBillingAccountNumber is not specified.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, billingInformation.

___existingBillingAccountNumber.description: Identifies an existing billing account to which the recurring and non-recurring charges for this request will be billed. Must be specified if billing contact and billing address are not specified

___billingContact.description: Identifies the information of the person or office to be contacted on billing matters. Used to establish a new billing account. Must be specified if existingBillingAccountNumber is not specified.

___billingInfo.description: An existing billing information to set up a new billing account.
